text:
Ashley Greene Ashley Greene is a married woman!

The thirty-one-year-old actress, who played Alice Cullen in the love movies about successful vampires, married the Australian television personality Paul Khoury on Friday in a rustic open-air ceremony at the Nestldown shelter in Los Gatos, California, near San Jose.

"It was a beautiful and unique place with sequoia groves, waterfalls and beautiful ponds with water lilies," a source told E! News.

former Greene actor Robert Pattinson Aaron Paul and wife Lauren Paul Evan Ross Josh Duhamel and Eiza Gonzáles and Cara Santana were among the guests. Santana posted a video of her and others on Instagram Stories with a private bus.

More than 1

00 people attended the wedding.

"They saw them reciting beautiful personal vows in the middle of a beautiful forest" the source told E! News. "It was a fairytale setting and could not have been happier."

The bride was wearing a low-cut Katie May wedding dress for the ceremony, Brides reported. He also sported a long veil on his hair, which was paired. Khoury wore a dark suit with a flower at the eyelet, the source told E! News.
title: Inside Ashley Greene and Paul Khoury’s Fairytale Wedding in the Forest
